Name: Cost Analysis TBI
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the following references if you use these data: 'Roy, A., Bernier, R. A., Wang, J., Benson, M., French, J., Good, D., & Hillary, F.G. The evolution of cost-efficiency in neural networks during recovery from traumatic brain injury. PLOS ONE (2017).' Also, pleases include the following: 'This data was obtained from the OpenfMRI database. Its accession number is ds000220'
Funding: This research was supported by the Social Sciences Research Institute at the Pennsylvania State University, University Park, PA-16801 and CTSI funding via the NIH
